subtitle.translate: A block designed to do one thing, store Storage Cells.

description: Negative this is no chest... it's a storage device!  Using /b/ME Drives/b/ you can store up to 10 /b/Storage Cells/b/ of any given type keep in mind however that it /6/requies a channel/6/. If you want to stack the drives just keep in mind channels can only reach 8 blocks radius from there stopping point when connected though other items.
Drives display there cells in the front and has various colors to help you find each cells staus
/c/Orange/c/ - Indicates the Storage Cell /6/cannot hold any more types, but it can store more items/6/.
/a/Green/a/ - Indicates the cell can hold more types and items and is /6/operational/6/.
/7/Black/7/ - Indicates there is no channel, or power is /6/offline/6/.

Its important to note, that without a ME Network this block does nothing. Its only useful when combined with a way to input, and output items, and requires 2 AE/t power to function, and additional power for each Storage Cell stored inside it.
